resources.string: Shop with Us and Enjoy a new style!
Login Image - There are five people and one big box with a heart drawing in the right side of it. Each person is holding something. There is a woman on top of the box holding a large gray shoe.
Welcome Image - Four people in a row they are hug each other and in the top of them there is a balloon with the word welcome
In this App you can see your list of shoes with it type and image
You can click on the add button to add a new pair of shoes.
You can click on an image to see the shoe\'s details as name, size, description, etc
